Real-Debrid Torrent Client LXC 
                RDTClient
                    is a web interface to manage your torrents on Real-Debrid, AllDebrid or Premiumize.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Real-Debrid Torrent Client LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE
                        Shell. 
                    To Update Real-Debrid Torrent Client, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC
                        Console.
                
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/rdtclient.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                Real-Debrid Torrent Client Interface: IP:6500

Real-Debrid Torrent Client LXC

RDTClient is a web interface to manage your torrents on Real-Debrid, AllDebrid or Premiumize.

To create a new Proxmox VE Real-Debrid Torrent Client LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Real-Debrid Torrent Client, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/rdtclient.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Real-Debrid Torrent Client Interface: IP:6500
